item.title: Alibaba Shows Progress in China AI Push, Lifting Shares
item.description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported a surge in revenue from China’s AI boom, helping assuage investors nervous about the fallout from a worsening battle with Meituan and JD.com Inc. in internet commer

item.title: Alibaba’s AI Revenue Climbs Even as China Food War Hurts Profit
item.description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported a surge in revenue from China’s AI boom, helping offset a surprise drop in profit tied to a worsening battle with Meituan and JD.com Inc. in internet commerce.

item.title: Alibaba’s AI Revenue Climbs Even as China Food War Hurts Profit
item.description: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported a surge in revenue from China’s AI boom, helping offset a surprise drop in profit tied to a worsening battle with Meituan and JD.com Inc. in internet commerce.

item.title: Alibaba, JD.com Deals Give Shot in the Arm to Asia Loan Market
item.description: Technology giants Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and JD.com are adding a jolt of energy to the Asian-Pacific syndicated loan market with plans to raise billions of dollars in foreign currency.

item.title: Alibaba, JD.com Deals Give Shot in the Arm to Asia Loan Market
item.description: Technology giants Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and JD.com are adding a jolt of energy to the Asian-Pacific syndicated loan market with plans to raise billions of dollars in foreign currency.
